newsitem.title: USA: Seaway Food sees Q4 net comparable to year-ago qtr.
newsitem.headline: Seaway Food sees Q4 net comparable to year-ago qtr.

text.p: Seaway Food Town Inc, a food and drug retailer with 70 shops, said Thursday it expects fiscal 1997 fourth quarter net income to be comparable to that of the year-ago quarter.
For the fourth quarter ended August 31,1996, the company reported net income of $2.43 million or $1.10 per share on sales of $154.5 million.
The 1996 quarter had 14 weeks, which added about $642,000, or $0.15 per share to net income for the quarter. It said its 1995 fourth quarter had 13 weeks.
